oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surfaces of revolution satisfying $\triangle^{III}\boldsymbol{x}=A\boldsymbol{x}$
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stamatakis, Stylianos
Al-Zoubi, Hassan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Differential Geometry
53A05, 47A75
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider surfaces of revolution in the three-dimensional Euclidean space which are of coordinate finite type with respect to the third fundamental form. We show that a surface of revolution satisfying the preceding relation is a catenoid or part of a sphere.
